DashboardSubtitle: Track and manage your data in one place
manageCrops: Manage your crops, earnings, and market insights.
addProduceDesc: Add new crops with details like crop name, quantity, price, grade, and location.
produceListDesc: Track the status of your crops from Added → Transported → Sold.
earningsOverviewDesc: View your total earnings, recent transactions, and profit summary.
marketPricesDesc: Stay updated with the latest market rates and pricing trends for different crops.
manageLogistics: Manage logistics, transport, and storage efficiently.
incomingProduceDesc: Check all produce arriving from farmers before transport.
updateTransportDesc: Track pickup dates, storage temperatures, and delivery status.
logisticsOverviewDesc: View current shipments, transport routes, and pending deliveries.
marketInsightsDesc: Get updates on market demand, pricing trends, and forecasts.
ConsumerSubtitle: Track and manage your data in one place.
Crop → Farmer Details → Transport Info →: Crop → Farmer Details → Transport Info → Retail Price. Visualized as a timeline or flowchart for easy tracking.
Scan or view QR codes for product authen: Scan or view QR codes for product authentication and detailed info.
Learn about eco-friendly practices and s: Learn about eco-friendly practices and support sustainable agriculture.
RetailerSubtitle: Manage stock, pricing, and sales efficiently
ReceivedProduceDesc: View all produce received from distributors and check status.
AddFinalPriceStockDesc: Update stock quantities and set final selling price for each crop.
GenerateQRCodeDesc: Create QR codes for consumers to track products and verify authenticity.
SalesOverviewDesc: Check sales performance and basic charts to analyze trends.
